result.title: Need help solving a problem
result.content: So there was a contest last night (not in codeforces), and there was problem that really got on my nerves and i was hoping someone could solve it for me. So the problem is: There is someone standing on the 0 point of XO line. and there are n candy's each at a distance of d(i) and each candy must be eaten at time [a(i) , b(i)], at any moment we can use R energy to eat all candys at distance R and get back to point 0, what is the minimum energy cost that we eat all the candy's. The limitations are n <= 300 ai , bi <= 10000 di <= 10000 and sorry for my bad english:)
